GraphicPackage.Name: Matplotlib
Plot.ly
GraphicPackage.EnableCommand:
import plotly as __cantor_plotly__ __cantor_plot_prefix__ = '%1' def __cantor_plotly_show__(figure): global __cantor_plot_global_counter__ __cantor_plt_filename__ = __cantor_plot_prefix__ + str(__cantor_plot_global_counter__) + '.png' __cantor_plot_global_counter__ += 1 figure.write_image(__cantor_plt_filename__, scale=2) print('\nINNER PLOT INFO CANTOR: ', __cantor_plt_filename__, sep='')
__cantor_plotly_original_show__ = __cantor_plotly__.basedatatypes.BaseFigure.show __cantor_plotly__.basedatatypes.BaseFigure.show = __cantor_plotly_show__
